labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Latest Canary on W10 x64 Pro. NOTE: This has nothing to do with my internet connection. It's at 71mbps download speed, ~19mbps upload, and all previews are inherently sluggish everywhere.
data.actual_result: There is a significant delay in the preview being loaded.
data.short_description: Lightbox previews for images are taking longer than usual to load
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a picture in a channel (no specific requirements). - Click the picture.
